TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TvInputManager extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Central system API to the overall TV input framework (TIF) architecture, which arbitrates interaction between applications and the selected TV inputs.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the user's parental controls enabled state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsRatingBlocked(class Android.Media.TV.TvContentRating rating) cil managed

Docs.param: The TV content rating to check. Can be TvContentRating#UNRATED.
Docs.summary: Checks whether a given TV content rating is blocked by the user.
Docs.returns: true if the given TV content rating is blocked, false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.RecordingError RecordingErrorInsufficientSpace = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.RecordingError enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.RecordingError enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Error for TvInputService.RecordingSession#notifyError(int) and TvRecordingClient.RecordingCallback#onError(int): The requested operation cannot be completed due to a problem that does not fit under any other error codes, or the error code for the problem is defined on the higher version than application's android:targetSdkVersion.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasBlackout = (16)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because of a geographical blackout.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasCardInvalid = (15)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because smart card is invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasCardMute = (14)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because smart card is muted.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because the output protection level enabled on the device is not sufficient to meet the requirements in the license policy.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasLicenseExpired = (10)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because Using a license in whhich the keys have expired.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasNeedActivation = (11)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because the device need be activated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasNeedPairing = (12)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because the device need be paired.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasNoCard = (13)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because smart card is missed.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because the PVR record is not allowed by the license policy.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasRebooting = (17)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because CAS system is rebooting.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonCasUnknown = (18)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because of unknown CAS error.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because the resource is not enough to meet requirement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason VideoUnavailableReasonNotConnected = (5)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.TV.VideoUnavailableReason enum directly instead of this field.", true)

Docs.summary: Reason for TvInputService.Session#notifyVideoUnavailable(int) and TvView.TvInputCallback#onVideoUnavailable(String, int): Video is unavailable because the source is not physically connected, for example the HDMI cable is not connected.
